comments:
build 2002-05-27 on WinXP.

In the CVS Repositories view I clicked on a project and selected Tag as 
Version. Then I entered a (bogus) name and hit "esc" to cancel. The UI reacted 
like I had hit "OK" and I got a message saying that an error had occurred and 
the following was in my log file.
